ISSUE.TITLE: Inconsistent build from source commands github vs docs
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Describe the bug** In [docs](https://labelstud.io/guide/install.html#Install-from-source) it says to use this command to build: `python setup.py develop` But in [github readme](https://github.com/heartexlabs/label-studio#install-for-local-development), it says to use this command: `pip install -e .` **Expected behavior** Unless this is by design, the commands should be the same

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Update install.md Fixing issue #918 to have install docs be consistent with github readme

Update install docs to fix issue #918 (#929) * Compressing blog card image * Update install.md Fixing issue #918 to have install docs be consistent with github readme * Delete LS-spacy-ner.png * Update install guidance Updating README and install docs per review feedback
